title: FedEx is working on new iOS app feature called ‘Crosstrack’ to compete with Shopify
content:
An article from TechCrunch shows how FedEx is working on a new feature called ‘Crosstrack’ for its mobile app. The shipping and receiving giant is testing the option to track deliveries from other services so users can do it all in one app. 

more…

The post FedEx is working on new iOS app feature called ‘Crosstrack’ to compete with Shopify appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: FedEx is working on a new feature called 'Crosstrack' for its mobile app to track deliveries from other services.
